backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an email update task for the ContactSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of all key frontend components, sections, data files, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining color tokens, CSS variables, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, fonts, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header, sections, and footer for the full site layout.
frontend/src/components/BrandButton.tsx: Custom button wrapper applying golden theme variants over the base UI Button.
frontend/src/components/sections/BlouseP: Section displaying six blouse pattern cards with images, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: A contact form component with validation, submission handling, success state, and UI rendering for user inquiries.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays a filterable, paginated gallery of items with category buttons and a load-more feature.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with a headline, call-to-action buttons, and an image, including smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Shows a four-step workflow using cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a grid of service offerings with icons and descriptions for different tailoring categories.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/data/galleryItems.ts: Exports the GalleryItem interface and a large list of gallery item objects with images, titles, and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for handling Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login status and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty stub file exporting nothing because the backend has no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, along with global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme tokens tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the tailoring websiteâ€™s features, requirements, and current state.
